name: Only One Light (igaryhe)
description:
A simple puzzle game about using only one light.

Control:

Keyboard:

wasd to move, arrow keys to rotate right, space to put/take light source.

Gamepad:

Left joystick to move, right joystick to rotate. (Dualshock 4) Square to put/take light source.

Goal:

You need to light up some buttons to open the gate, find your way to the next level!
